category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA_auxfiles_enable
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible configure the generation mode of auxiliary file formats. Possible values: 0 - generation of all auxiliary file formats is completely inhibited 1 - generation of all auxiliary file formats is active, unless specifically inhibited at file level through custom property TCAA_SKIP_AUXILIARY 2 - (available starting from TCAA 11.4) generation of all auxiliary file formats is inhibited in general, but it can be specifically activated at file level through custom property TCAA_ALLOW_AUXILIARY Default Value: 1
